https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_YAmsAwSEHA
by Luca Todesco
Explains the history.
Explains how researchers are just one input into an industry comprising specialists as
well as integrators.
Explains the change in threat model from enthusiastic jailbreakers to nation state / intelligence /
law / forensics.

Also calls out a talk by Halvarflake on how to get going
